title: Class and style binding

類和樣式繫結link

Class and style bindinglink

使用類和樣式繫結從元素的 class 屬性中新增和刪除 CSS 類別名稱，以及動態設定樣式。

Use class and style bindings to add and remove CSS class names from an element's class attribute and to set styles dynamically.

前提條件link

Prerequisiteslink

  • property 繫結

    Property binding

繫結到單個 CSS classlink

Binding to a single CSS classlink

要建立單個類繫結，請鍵入以下內容：

To create a single class binding, type the following:

[class.sale]="onSale"

當繫結表示式 onSale 為真值時，Angular 會新增類，當表示式為假值時，它會刪除類 —— undefined 除外。有關更多資訊，參閱樣式委託。

Angular adds the class when the bound expression, onSale is truthy, and it removes the class when the expression is falsy—with the exception of undefined. See styling delegation for more information.

繫結到多個 CSS 類link

Binding to multiple CSS classeslink

要繫結到多個類，請鍵入以下內容：

To bind to multiple classes, type the following:

[class]="classExpression"

表示式可以是以下之一：

The expression can be one of:

  • 用空格分隔的類別名稱字串。

    A space-delimited string of class names.

  • 以類別名稱作為鍵名並將真或假表示式作為值的物件。

    An object with class names as the keys and truthy or falsy expressions as the values.

  • 類別名稱的陣列。

    An array of class names.

對於物件格式，Angular 會在其關聯的值為真時才新增類別。

With the object format, Angular adds a class only if its associated value is truthy.

對於任何類似物件的表示式（比如 object、Array、Map 或 Set，必須更改物件的參考，Angular 才能更新類列表。在不更改物件參考的情況下只更新其 Attribute 是不會生效的。

With any object-like expression—such as object, Array, Map, or Set —the identity of the object must change for Angular to update the class list. Updating the property without changing object identity has no effect.

如果同一類別名稱有多個繫結，Angular 會根據樣式優先順序來確定要使用的繫結。

If there are multiple bindings to the same class name, Angular uses styling precedence to determine which binding to use.

下表是各種類繫結語法的小結。

The following table summarizes class binding syntax.

繫結型別Binding Type 語法Syntax 輸入屬性Input Type 範例輸入值Example Input Values
單一類繫結Single class binding [class.sale]="onSale" boolean | undefined | null true, false
多重類繫結Multi-class binding [class]="classExpression" string "my-class-1 my-class-2 my-class-3"
多重類繫結Multi-class binding [class]="classExpression" Record<string, boolean | undefined | null> {foo: true, bar: false}
多重類繫結Multi-class binding [class]="classExpression" Array<string> ['foo', 'bar']

繫結到單一樣式link

Binding to a single stylelink

要建立單個樣式繫結，請使用 style 字首，後跟一個點和 CSS 樣式的名稱。

To create a single style binding, use the prefix style followed by a dot and the name of the CSS style.

比如，要設定 'width' 樣式，請鍵入以下內容：[style.width]="width"

For example, to set the width style, type the following: [style.width]="width"

Angular 將該屬性設定為繫結表示式的值，這通常是一個字串。（可選）你可以新增單位副檔名，比如 em 或 %，這需要數字型別。

Angular sets the property to the value of the bound expression, which is usually a string. Optionally, you can add a unit extension like em or %, which requires a number type.

  1. 要以中線格式（dash-case）編寫樣式，請鍵入以下內容：

    To write a style in dash-case, type the following:

    <nav [style.background-color]="expression"></nav>

  2. 要以駝峰格式（camelCase）編寫樣式，請鍵入以下內容：

    To write a style in camelCase, type the following:

    <nav [style.backgroundColor]="expression"></nav>

繫結到多個樣式link

Binding to multiple styleslink

要切換多個樣式，請繫結到 [style] Attribute，比如 [style]="styleExpression"。styleExpression 可以是如下格式之一：

To toggle multiple styles, bind to the [style] attribute—for example, [style]="styleExpression". The styleExpression can be one of:

  • 樣式的字串列表，比如 "width: 100px; height: 100px; background-color: cornflowerblue;"。

    A string list of styles such as "width: 100px; height: 100px; background-color: cornflowerblue;".

  • 一個物件，其鍵名是樣式名，其值是樣式值，比如 {width: '100px', height: '100px', backgroundColor: 'cornflowerblue'}。

    An object with style names as the keys and style values as the values, such as {width: '100px', height: '100px', backgroundColor: 'cornflowerblue'}.

注意，不支援把陣列繫結給 [style]。

Note that binding an array to [style] is not supported.

當把 [style] 繫結到物件表示式時，該物件的參考必須改變，這樣 Angular 才能更新這個類列表。在不改變物件參考的情況下更新其屬性值是不會生效的。

When binding [style] to an object expression, the identity of the object must change for Angular to update the class list. Updating the property without changing object identity has no effect.

單樣式和多樣式繫結範例link

Single and multiple-style binding examplelink

@Component({ selector: 'app-nav-bar', template: ` <nav [style]='navStyle'> <a [style.text-decoration]="activeLinkStyle">Home Page</a> <a [style.text-decoration]="linkStyle">Login</a> </nav>` }) export class NavBarComponent { navStyle = 'font-size: 1.2rem; color: cornflowerblue;'; linkStyle = 'underline'; activeLinkStyle = 'overline'; /* . . . */ }

如果同一個樣式 Attribute 有多個繫結，Angular 將使用樣式優先順序來確定要使用的繫結。

If there are multiple bindings to the same style attribute, Angular uses styling precedence to determine which binding to use.

下表是各種樣式繫結語法的小結。

The following table summarizes style binding syntax.

繫結型別Binding Type 語法Syntax 輸入屬性Input Type 範例輸入值Example Input Values
單一樣式繫結Single style binding [style.width]="width" string | undefined | null "100px"
帶單位的單一樣式繫結Single style binding with units [style.width.px]="width" number | undefined | null 100
多重樣式繫結Multi-style binding [style]="styleExpression" string "width: 100px; height: 100px"
多重樣式繫結Multi-style binding [style]="styleExpression" Record<string, string | undefined | null> {width: '100px', height: '100px'}

樣式優先順序link

Styling precedencelink

一個 HTML 元素可以將其 CSS 類列表和樣式值繫結到多個源（比如，來自多個指令的宿主繫結）。

A single HTML element can have its CSS class list and style values bound to multiple sources (for example, host bindings from multiple directives).
